div.bibl: Rassviet (The Dawn), Apr. 1, 1936. FOR THE ATTENTION OF MEMBERS OF BRANCH NUMBER EIGHTEEN, R. I. M. A. S.

body.p: The administration of the Krylov Society advises its members that the regular business meeting of Branch Number Eighteen will be held on Sunday, April 2, at two o'clock, at 2936 North Mason Avenue. Attendance of all members is mandatory, for important matters will come up for decision. At the meeting the financial statement will be submitted for approval. Members are requested not to be late for the meeting. Non-members may also attend.
